title: Chop'd
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A build-your-own salad bar with numerous vegan toppings. Also has other vegan choices such as vegetable gyoza, soups, chili, stews and wraps. All food is made-in-house daily.
streetAddress: St Pancras International Station, Euston Rd
